name: 林益辰
objective: 本課程之目的在使學生了解資料的本質，並使熟悉統計之方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基楚。
schedule:
Week1-3: Introduction to Statistics, Population, Sample, Fields of Stat.
Week4-6: Descriptive Stat and Inferential Stat.
Quiz
Week7-9: Probability and Distributions
Midterm test
week10-13: Discrete and continuous distributions
Week14-17: Estimation and Hypothesis test
Quiz
Week18: Final
scorePolicy:
1.平時成績（出席，上課情形學習狀況）：15%
2.小考：25%；
3.期中考：30%；
4.期末考：30%。
materials: 統計學導論，方世榮，華泰文化，修訂五版2007
